attributes.review: I’ve downloaded this app to see how I could vote for president in November then I saw all the accomplishes that he made during his presidency and the ones that in 2016 he said he was going to make which didn’t end up happening sooooooo this app is spreading false information about Democrats and people who don’t agree with his point of you is a way to make people like him and persuade them to vote for him but he is a fool a big fat orange potato and must be voted out of office in November vote Joe Biden in 2020
attributes.title: This is the worst app on the face of the earth

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE. I have no clue on earth why someone would put this in the App Store!!!! I am very disgusted. I hope I NEVER see this app again. For starters it took months to download. THEN It played HORRIBLE Music I can’t even....EWWWWW anyway then when the app asked for my number I got a text from a SERIAL KILLER saying he is going to attack my family and kill all of us leaving only me. THENNN I got so scared I had a heart attack and had to go to the hospital. And that’s where I am now. All of this bad juju for a APP THAT IS TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!! I WISH TO NEVER SEE THE APP AGAIN
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: So you might be a little thrown off by the title off my review but let me just explain, so I downloaded the app because I knew it was something I absolutely needed!!! And I was charging my phone and I got up to get some prune juice and I walked back with my prune juice and I stubbed my toe on My coffee table which made me spill my prune juice on the charger and I cleaned it up but when I opened the app Trump 2020 on my phone the phone started electrocuting me and it hurt so I dropped my phone and it hit my big toe and electrocuted it so much MY BIG TOE FELL OFF!!!
attributes.title: BURNED MY BIG TOE OFF

attributes.review: It has come to my attention that our “lovely”🤢 president has decided to ban tiktok in America and that’s not very cash money of him and as a gen z we need tiktok because it lets us be us trump is taking everything away from us but the one thing he can’t take is tiktok. Go ahead and say “it’s just an app” sure Karen just like how Facebook is just an app taking away tiktok means taking away our personality’s our friends our community so I hope by reading all these reviews you pretty please don’t ban tiktok (bats eyelashes)
attributes.title: SAVE TIKTOK 2020

attributes.review:
This is the greatest country on earth with the most realistic, honest, and hard working president we’ve ever seen and they let some libtard tech company in a city full of homosexuals build this app????? 

Just like everyone else I put my information in and now I’m getting nonstop calls - even on Sunday!!! I can’t even understand them when they call everyone has an accent THIS IS AMERICA WE SPEAK ENGLISH.

I’m sick of these libtards thinking they can build a better country can’t even build a good app.
attributes.title: Built by the radical left

attributes.review: So i downloaded this app and omg 🥵 when i opened it the hottest orange cheeto showed up 🤩🧚🏼 But then... i kept getting these weird notifications so i thought why don’t i end my misery forever? 😌 I deleted my hunky orange man 🥰 notifications and went on with my day. THEN i got one hours after turning notifications off 😡😡 it surprised me so much seeing our orange god that i threw my phone out into the street 😤😤 when i went to reach it a car ran over me lolz 😂😂 I’m ok now but i’m writing from my hospital bed
attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED 😱😱 (not clickbait)
